name: Everything Went Better Than Expected
description:
The song is based on a band called Vilma Palma e Vampiros, and the song is 'Lla Pachanga'

The character of the poster is Dropsy! An upcoming adventure game by Jay Tholen! You should check it out it's gonna be great http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jaytholen/dropsy

And of course we don't own the rights of the characters and names used in the main menu, but we surely hope that the respective owners have enough sense of humor and understanding.
